name: lusail-residence
title: Lusail Residence
heading: Residential Compound  New Cairo
subHeading: Lusail Residence offers an unparalleled living experience at New Cairo, where nature and design seamlessly blend.
description: Lusail Residence offers an unparalleled living experience at New Cairo, where nature and design seamlessly blend. The thoughtfully crafted units allow residents to enjoy breathtaking views and an abundance of natural light, creating an atmosphere of tranquility and serenity. Inside, every space has been optimized to embrace the warmth of sunlight, brightening interiors and uplifting daily living.

The layout of each residence is designed to boost natural ventilation, ensuring a continuous flow of fresh air that energizes the environment. Efficient use of space combines practicality with a refined aesthetic, offering a balance of form and function that enhances everyday life. Premium amenities and facilities are curated to provide a sense of ease and indulgence, making each moment at home feel exceptional.

Residents can enjoy a wide range of recreational and wellness amenities, including swimming pools, paddle tennis courts, and a fitness center. Spa and wellness centers, yoga spaces, and meditation areas provide ultimate relaxation, while fine dining restaurants, casual cafes, and outdoor BBQ areas cater to every culinary craving. Family-friendly spaces like a kids' club, gathering areas, and outdoor event spaces foster a vibrant community atmosphere.

For those who enjoy the outdoors, Lusail Residence offers cycle trails, jogging tracks, and serene reading lounges, while concierge services and retail shops further enhance convenience. The compound is designed to support both an active and relaxed lifestyle, enriching every moment for its residents.
bannerText: The Residences offer a state of harmony that is truly unique in the world of living
facilities: Airline/Private Air Reservations Airport / Ground Transportation Arrangements
Gym & Fitness Center, Sauna and steam room
Outdoor entertainment swimming Pool and changing rooms
contactDescription: The Residences at Sheraton Mostakbal City, New Cairo is a new community providing residents with an escape from the crowds, noise, and pollution of Cairo. It is easily accessible and strategically located near the main gate and entrance to Mostakbal City.

contactDetails.text: from The Iconic Tower, New Capital
from The American University in Cairo

news.name: Sheraton-Residences
news.title: Sheraton Residences
news.description: Margins Developments Launches Sheraton Residences with Omar Khairat‚Äôs Captivating Performance at Abdeen Palace
news.subDescription: Margins Developments participated in Cityscape Global Riyadh with exclusive offers across all its projects, led by Sheraton Residences. As the first Sheraton-branded residential project in Egypt and the Middle East, this unique compound in Mostakbal City New Cairo, offers unmatched luxury and premium services. The project‚Äôs distinct features and strategic location make it a standout investment opportunity, enhancing its value in the Egyptian real estate market.

name: sheraton-residences
title: Sheraton Residences
heading: Mostakbal City
subHeading: A world renowned icon in hospitality, Margins Developments incooperations with El Rabwa Group bring The Residencesat Sheraton Mostakbal City,New Cairo to Egypt
description: Bringing the global brand's celebrated pedigree and commitment to excellence to the Egyptian real estate industry. With a focus on luxury and exceptional service, the residences provide owners with a truly unparalleled living experience.

The Residences offer a level of exclusivity that is hard to come by in the city. With only a limited number of units available, residents can enjoy a sense of privacy and seclusion that is rare in such a bustling metropolis. And with a range of high-end amenities and features, including a private cinema and rooftop terrace, residents can unwind in style without ever having to leave the comfort of their own home.

It is a testament to the service culture that Sheraton has established in the hospitality world with its commitment to delivering exceptional hospitality experiences around the world. With a focus on convenience, and exclusivity, the Residences offer owners the opportunity to live in one of the world's most vibrant cities in unparalleled comfort and style.
